short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A zoom tool for the Influence Web3 game's "Plan Flight" chart. Provides a magnifying glass that can zoom using the mouse wheel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A zoom tool for the Influence Web3 game's "Plan Flight" chart. Provides a magnifying glass that can zoom using the mouse wheel.
